talk0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>I will! I will try my very hardest in the
absence of Captain Bazz!
talk0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Traveler! <sp:5:1:0>We are in your debt for this
great deed.

The sludge that was marring The Turning
Tide has disappeared completely!

<sp:3:0:2:0a01>I must report this to Lady Yona at once...
Urp!<sp:5:1:0> Urgh...<sp:5:1:0> I would like to share this
joyous news, however...
In this state, I fear that if I met with Lady
Yona... <sp:5:1:0>Ugh...<sp:5:1:0> I may dispel the contents
of my stomach upon her noble self. <sp:5:1:0>Urp.
talk0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Tired>Urp. <sp:5:0:0>The Turning Tide is clean at last.<sp:5:1:0> If
only I could share this news with Lady
Yona. However...<sp:5:1:0>I cannot in this condition.
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:LaughS_00>I will make quick work of any and all
monsters that try to set one dastardly
toe inside of Lookout Landing!
Please rest assured that all is well here
as you continue your journey.
talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Scare_01>Urp! <sp:5:0:0>The sludge is in my gills...<sp:5:0:0> Ack!


Oh...<sp:5:0:0> Our poor statue, The Turning Tide...<sp:5:0:0>
is covered in sludge as well. Ugh.

How long must we endure the foul effects
of the Upheaval? <sp:5:0:0>Honestly.<sp:5:0:0> Uuurp!
BlackZelda_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Rumors have a way of making me feel
uncertain and ill at ease.

If only the waterfalls streaming out of the
castle reached all the way down to the
moat below.
If they did, we could simply swim up and
see for ourselves just what is going on
up there...
talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Tired_00>Ugh...<sp:5:0:0> This is terrible.


I require my wits about me in order to
effectively patrol, but my gills are in
turmoil because of <sp:5:0:0>the sludge.<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0000>And yet...<sp:5:0:0>I am heartened by the domain's
statue, The Turning Tide, being returned
to its pristine state.
It is truly so necessary for it to be
standing proud and shining brightly
in the middle of everything.
BlackZelda_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It seems incredible danger of some sort
has found us all.

I do not know much, but I know this.
We need only to protect this place and
trust in you and King Sidon!
talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_01>The sludge is no longer filling my gills!<sp:5:1:0>
The treatment worked with such speed
that I only suffered minor symptoms.
It is all thanks to Lady Yona's cure!


All right! Oh, yeah! I will now get out
there and resume my patrol!
talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>Ahhh.<sp:5:1:0> Ah ha haaa!<sp:5:0:0> Hello. <sp:5:0:0>Oooh.<sp:5:0:0> Oooh
ah ah!<sp:5:0:0> Whoooa!

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Yes! My voice is as good as gold again.
<sp:5:0:0>I feel so much better.

Just earlier, Lady Yona treated my gills.


And look at me now! I can return to work
at full health once more!
BlackZelda_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I do not understand what is happening in
the world.

Yet, I know this much. We need only to
protect this place and trust in you and
King Sidon!
talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Tired_01>*sigh* <sp:5:0:0>Our poor statue, The Turning Tide,
is covered in sludge.

How long must we endure this foul
predicament...<sp:5:0:0> Urp! <sp:5:1:0>Ugh...
talk0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Ease_01>When I gaze upon The Turning Tide,
I am heartened.<sp:5:1:0> I am so glad that it is
pristine once again.<sp:5:0:0> Urp!
My gills are in turmoil, but I can push
through this.<sp:5:1:0> I must make it through
my patrol.
talk0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Humming_01>Aaah! Aha haaa! Aha HAAA!


Oooh! I can feel my voice reverberating
from the depths of my belly!

I am sooo happy <sp:5:0:0>that Lady Yona
cured me!
talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_00>I feel great! Fantastic, even! Lady Yona is
truly amazing!

Now I can patrol the domain as often and
for as long as I please!
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>Link! It is you! So, you have returned to
Lookout Landing, eh?
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>We of the Zora brigade were sent here by
order of King Sidon!

Please rest assured that we are sworn to
protect Lookout Landing, by the honor of
our king!
talk0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Ease_00>Urgh... <sp:5:1:0>I appreciate your concern.


However, there is no time to dwell on
my misfortune.

You see, our brave Captain Bazz set out
for the Skyview Tower, to the west of the
domain, to investigate the sludge.
Us soldiers who remained behind must
vigilantly protect the domain.<sp:5:1:0> Urgh... <sp:5:0:0>Urp!
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>King Sidon and Queen Yona are the
protectors of the domain.<sp:5:0:0> Nothing
could be more reassuring than that.
That means that we, too, can focus
our full energies on guarding
Lookout Landing.
talk0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Ease_00>Roger! <sp:5:0:0>Urp... <sp:5:1:0>I will do my best in the
absence of Captain Bazz!
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>We of the Zora brigade were sent here by
order of King Sidon!

Please rest assured that we are sworn to
protect Lookout Landing, by the honor of
King Sidon!
near0006: My voice is good as gold!
talk0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_01>Indeed! I am as good as new once again!<sp:5:0:0>
What's more, I am positively overflowing
with motivation.
Captain Bazz set out for the Skyview
Tower, to the west of the domain, in
order to investigate the sludge.
That means we are short on Zora here.
We need every ounce of enthusiasm we
can muster!
Us soldiers who remained behind must
vigilantly protect the domain!
